messages.body: $AAPL Stock market rebound starts this week...

$AAPL Black Friday rings up record $6.2 billion in online sales:  Laptops...among the top selling products:
https://www.cnet.com/news/black-friday-2018-rings-up-record-6-2-billion-in-online-sales/

links.title: Black Friday rings up record $6.2 billion in online sales
links.description: Black Friday may bring to mind images of bargain hunters rushing stores when the doors are opened, but online shoppers were also ready to pounce on deals this year. Online sales for Black Friday hit $6.2 billion in the US, up 23.6 percent from a year ago and a new record high, according to Adobe Analytics.

links.description: Ventas, Inc. (NYSE:VTR) EVP T Richard Riney sold 15,288 shares of the business's stock in a transaction dated Tuesday, November 20th. The shares were sold at an average price of $62.50, for a total value of $955,500.00. The sale was disclosed in a document filed with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which is accessible through this hyperlink.
